metatags.og:title: Satellite photo showing the three major fires active in Northern Alberta - Wildfire Today
metatags.og:description: This satellite photo taken at 5:40 p.m. MDT April 28 shows the locations of three major wildfires in Northern Alberta. The imagery was enhanced to enhanced to show the heat generated by the active fires. As predicted, the wind on Tuesday was out of the west which made the east sides of the fire more … Continue reading "Satellite photo showing the three major fires active in Northern Alberta"

title: Forced Out by Deadly Fires, Then Trapped in Traffic - The New York ...
htmlTitle: Forced Out by Deadly Fires, Then Trapped in Traffic - The New York ...
snippet: Nov 11, 2018 ... People fleeing the Camp Fire in Paradise, Calif., abandoned their vehicles because of traffic; their cars remained along the road on Sunday.
htmlSnippet: Nov 11, 2018 ... People fleeing the Camp Fire in Paradise, Calif., abandoned their vehicles because of traffic; their cars remained along the road on Sunday.

metatags.og:description: The infernos raging at both ends of California have created a double nightmare for residents. Many who fled fires found themselves stuck on traffic-clogged roads. Some died in their cars.
